page-1.title: Great job removing the nets!
page-1.body: Those nets were dangerous to animals because they can get caught in them, making it difficult to swim.

page-2.title: Watch this video to learn about a turtle that was caught in a ghost net!
page-2.body: How Will Rescuers Use HONEY To Save This Sea Turtle? | Rescued! | Dodo Kids

page-1.title: Great job removing the nets!
page-1.body: Those nets were dangerous to animals on the beach, such as Seagulls and crabs. Their feet or wings can get caught in the nets, making it difficult to fly or walk.

page-2.title: Watch this video to see how you can help clean up trash in the ocean!
page-2.body: Ghost Net Art as Environmental Activism
